|brand = 3Com |model = 3C905C |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = X-TX-M |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 08/20/2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/3Com_3C905CX-TX-M |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = PCI |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = <!-- Connector Form Factor, Leave blank for none -->
|vendor_id = 10b7 |device_id = 9200 |subvendor_id = 10b7 |subdevice_id = 1000 |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |ethoui = 00:04:75
|chip1 = 3Com;40-0654-002; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|linuxdriv = 3c59x |windriv =

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "(C)2002 3COM CORPORATION", the newer '''3Com''' logo, the product info box, and some other stuff is silkscreened on the top of this particular board. :The Ethernet controller (BGA package) is labeled with... :*the newer '''3Com''' logo :*'''920-ST06''' :*'''3Com 40-0654-002''' :*'''MG0Q60 UA''' (may be MGOQ60) :*'''C 2052'''
